Package org.activebpel.rt.bpel.coord

This package contains the base classes for implementing coordination.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
IAeCoordinating Defines an activity that is either the coordinator or the participant (coordinatable).
IAeCoordinationContext Interface for a WS-Coordination context.
IAeCoordinationManager Interface for a coordination manager.
IAeCoordinator Defines the interface for object that acts as the coordinator.
IAeCreateContextRequest Interface for a WS-Coordination CreateCoordinationContext Note: This is an internal implementation tailored to be used with requirement 111 ie - the interface provides a simple property getter and setter.
IAeCreateContextResponse Interface for a WS-Coordination CreateCoordinationContextResponse Note: This is an internal implementation tailored to be used with requirement 111 ie - the interface provides a simple property getter and setter.
IAeParticipant Interface to indicate the participant in a coordinated activity.
IAeProtocolMessage Interface for a WS-Coordination protocol message that is exchanged between the coordinator and the participant.
IAeProtocolState Interface to indicate WS-Coordination protocol state.
IAeRegistrationRequest Interface for a WS-Coordination registation request.
IAeRegistrationResponse Interface for a WS-Coordination registation response.
 

Class Summary
AeCoordinationDetail Contains instance information about a coordination.
 

Exception Summary
AeCoordinationException Base class for coordination related exceptions.
AeCoordinationFaultException Exception generated by either the coordinator or the particpant due to errors related to the coordination activity.
AeCoordinationNotFoundException Exception to indicate a coordination or context was not found in the server.
 

Package org.activebpel.rt.bpel.coord Description

This package contains the base classes for implementing coordination.
